title: Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart, Steel Mesh Removable Sides, 3 cu ft, 400 lb Capacity, Green
descriptions:
Transform your gardening game with the sturdy and versatile Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart! Whether you're a green-thumbed hobbyist or a seasoned landscaper, this robust cart is the perfect companion for all your outdoor projects.

Crafted with a rock-solid steel frame and a tough steel mesh bed, this cart is built to withstand the rigors of yard work. The innovative design features easily removable side panels, allowing you to convert it into a flatbed cart to accommodate larger items with ease.

Rolling on four 10-inch pneumatic tires, the Gorilla Cart boasts a tight turn radius and ample ground clearance, ensuring effortless maneuverability over rough terrains. The straight pull handle is designed for comfort and control, making it a breeze to transport loads of up to 400 pounds.

With quick assembly, you'll be ready to haul soil, mulch, tools, and more in no time. The garden cart's bed dimensions of 34 inches in length and 18 inches in width provide a spacious 3 cubic feet volume, perfect for all your gardening essentials.

Finished in a vibrant green color, this garden cart not only works hard but looks great in any outdoor setting. Rest assured with a 1-year limited warranty that guarantees your investment.

The Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart is more than just a garden cart; it's an indispensable tool that will elevate your gardening efficiency. Get yours today and experience the difference in durability, flexibility, and performance!

Transform your garden work into a breeze with the robust and versatile Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart. Designed with the avid gardener's needs in mind, this green garden cart is a powerhouse in hauling and maneuverability.

Crafted from sturdy steel mesh, the Gorilla Cart's frame is built to last, ensuring that you can tackle the toughest of yard duties. Whether you're moving soil, plants, or heavy equipment, the 400 lb weight capacity and spacious 3 cubic feet bed, measuring 34 inches in length and 18 inches in width, can handle it all with ease.

One of the most striking features of this garden cart is its convertible design. The removable side panels allow you to swiftly transform the cart into a flatbed, providing flexibility for oversized loads. With this adaptable functionality, there's no task too big or too small.

Worried about rough terrain? The Gorilla Cart laughs in the face of obstacles with its 10-inch pneumatic tires, tight turn radius, and ample ground clearance. The four-wheel design promises stability, while the straight pull handle ensures comfortable maneuverability, even when fully loaded.

Quick and simple assembly means you'll be out in the yard in no time, without any hassle. And with a 1-year limited warranty, you can put your trust in the Gorilla Carts brand to support your gardening ventures season after season.

At just 36.6 pounds, this garden cart combines lightweight design with heavy-duty performance. The overall height of 37 inches is thoughtfully designed to make loading and unloading effortless.

Embrace the ease of garden work with the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart. It's not just a tool; it's your trusty garden companion, ready to make every garden task as enjoyable as a walk in the park. Get yours today and revolutionize the way you garden!
